messages.content: what is better https://github.com/cuthbertLab/music21 or https://github.com/MarcTheSpark/scamp?

It depends on your needs. music21 is a popular library for music analysis and has a wide range of features. scamp is a newer library with a focus on ease of use and speed. Both have their advantages and disadvantages, so it's best to take a look at the documentation of both and decide which one fits your needs better.

What is the difference between decoders and decoders-encoders in context AI models?

The difference between decoders and decoders-encoders in the context of AI models is that decoders are used to take an encoded output and generate a prediction, while decoders-encoders are used to take an encoded output and generate a new encoded output. Decoders-encoders are typically used when the output of the model needs to be further processed, such as when generating a sequence of tokens from a text input.
What is so special about BERT models?

BERT models are special because they are transformer-based language models that use a combination of deep learning and natural language processing to achieve state-of-the-art results on a variety of tasks, such as text classification, text generation, and question answering. They are also efficient and easy to use, making them a popular choice for many AI applications.
